publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5040 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Personal Injuries (NHS Charges) (Amounts) (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Personal Injuries (NHS Charges) (Amounts) (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-5040 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Personal Injuries (NHS Charges) (Amounts) (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Personal Injuries (NHS Charges) (Amounts) (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
